description: Examines the broad philosophies, paradigms and methodologies associated with social research in natural and agrifood systems and rural communities. Provides examples of the field application of various methodologies and assists students to develop their own research proposals.
incompatible: AG869 or AG803 or QM741 or 425 or 434 or NR314 or NRSM3004 or MGTS3965 or 6960 or ENVM3522
